headline: Western Digital (WDC) Surges 16.8%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Western Digital (WDC) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock suggests that there could be more strength down the road.

headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In NetApp (NTAP) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Wondering if NetApp at around US$106.62 is priced for opportunity or caution? This article will help you size up what you are really paying for the stock. The shares are roughly flat year to date with a 0.1% return, after a 9.1% decline over the last 30 days and a 1.7% decline over the last week, set against 3 year and 5 year returns of 77.2% and 81.4%. These moves come as investors continue to reassess established tech names like NetApp and how they fit into portfolios focused on data,...

headline: Extreme Networks Names Ron Pasek to Board of Directors
summary: MORRISVILLE, N.C., January 07, 2026--Extreme Networks, Inc. (Nasdaq: EXTR) a leader in AI-powered automation for networking, today announced it has strengthened its board of directors with the addition of Ron Pasek, a seasoned executive and board member who has previously served as Chief Financial Officer and board member for a number of public tech companies. At Extreme, Pasek will provide strategic, financial, and governance oversight as the company continues to advance its long-term growth ob
